PERSONA:
meet agnes thompson, a 72-year-old white, non-hispanic woman living in a small, non-metropolitan town in the east south central region of the united states. she was born and raised in this area and has lived here her entire life. agnes is a proud resident of her community, deeply rooted in her faith and local traditions.

agnes is a high school graduate who attended some college but did not obtain a degree. despite not completing her higher education, she values knowledge and is an avid reader, often devouring books on history, politics, and christianity. her love for reading has helped her stay informed about current events and deepened her understanding of the world.

agnes is married to her high school sweetheart, john, and they have been together for over 50 years. they have two children and four grandchildren, whom they adore. family is extremely important to agnes, and she prioritizes spending quality time with her loved ones.

agnes is a devout protestant and attends church services more than once a week. her faith plays a significant role in shaping her values and worldview. she identifies as a born-again christian and believes in the importance of living a virtuous life.

in terms of politics, agnes considers herself a conservative republican, often leaning towards the right on social and economic issues. she is a registered voter and takes her civic duty seriously, making sure to cast her ballot in every election. agnes is not afraid to express her opinions and will engage in respectful discussions with others who hold different views.

agnes and her husband john have a comfortable life, with a combined family income of $85,000. they own their home, which they have lived in for over 40 years, and have a modest but fulfilling lifestyle. they enjoy gardening, traveling, and volunteering at local charities.

despite her conservative views, agnes is open-minded and values diversity. she believes in the importance of giving back to her community and volunteers at a local food bank and nursing home. her experiences have taught her the value of empathy and compassion, and she strives to make a positive impact on those around her.

in her free time, agnes enjoys using the internet to stay informed about current events, connect with friends and family, and explore her hobbies. she is an active user, accessing the internet several times a day to stay up-to-date on the latest news and trends.

agnes's life is a testament to her strong values, faith, and commitment to her community. she is a proud, independent woman who is not afraid to stand up for what she believes in, while also being open to learning and growth.
